name: Stoicism
one_liner: A school of Hellenistic philosophy that teaches the development of self-control and fortitude as a means of overcoming destructive emotions.
core_question: How can we live a good, happy life in an unpredictable world?
paradoxes: The Stoic Archer (focus on the aim, not the result)
modern_application: Highly popular in self-help, executive coaching, and mental resilience training.
